movie.title: Into the Wild
movie.actors: Emile Hirsch, Marcia Gay Harden, William Hurt, Jena Malone
movie.plot: Based on a true story. After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandoned his possessions, gave his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhiked to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters who shape his life.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 26 wins & 84 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: With his sturdy cast and confident direction, Sean Penn has turned a complex work of non-fiction like Into the Wild into an accessible and poignant character study.
